dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises 1449 images with annotations for 20 object classes. Noteworthy for its diversity, each image may contain a single or multiple objects, making it a versatile benchmark for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C. Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO-80 presents a complex multi-object scene understanding challenge, featuring diverse object categories and rich annotations, including instance-level segmentation masks. It goes beyond traditional semantic segmentation datasets.
dcterms:title: COCO-80

dcterms:creator: Alexander Kirillov
Eric Mintun
Nikhila Ravi
Hanzi Mao
Chloe Rolland
Laura Gustafson
Tete Xiao
Spencer Whitehead
Alexander C. Berg
Wan-Yen Lo
dcterms:description: The Segment Anything dataset is designed for training models to segment any object in images, providing a large-scale dataset for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: SA-1B

dcterms:creator: Robin Rombach
Andreas Blattmann
Dominik Lorenz
Patrick Esser
Björn Ommer
dcterms:description: Stable Diffusion is a model for high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion techniques, enabling the generation of realistic images from textual descriptions.
dcterms:title: Stable Diffusion
